Body:
""""
        ImpulsiveResponse pytta save test
        """
xt = pytta.generate.sweep(fftDegree=16)
noise = pytta.generate.noise(fftDegree=16, startMargin=0, stopMargin=0)
noise *= 0.5
yt = xt + noise
IR = pytta.ImpulsiveResponse(excitation=xt, recording=yt, method='Ht',
    winType='hann', winSize=44100 * 0.1, overlap=0.6, samplingRate=noise.
    samplingRate, freqMax=10000, freqMin=100, comment='testing the stuff')
pytta.save(self.filename, IR)
a = pytta.load(self.filename)
loadedlst = [pyttaobj for pyttaobj in a]
self.assertSequenceEqual(loadedlst[0].systemSignal.timeSignal.tolist(), IR.
    systemSignal.timeSignal.tolist())
